message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $180 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we settle at $150?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we aim for $135?
